Item 1
Host a Successful Event
Gainesville Meetings & Events
Inspired by the innovative spirit of UF Health and downtown Gainesville, Hotel ELEO offers 1,100 sq. ft. of contemporary event space, perfect for sophisticated business events and social gatherings. Our elegant venues are ideal for corporate retreats, luncheons, and dinners, ensuring every detail is flawless and every experience rewarding. Bring your vision to life with us.
The experience is further enhanced with an additional 2,000 sq. ft of outdoor patio space surrounded by the beautiful Rush Lake, radiating a sense of calm and peace of mind.
Meeting & Event Venues
Stylish in design and captivating indoor/outdoor venues are perfect for your intimate meeting and events in Gainesville, Florida. From selecting a venue to designing incredible menus and décor, we help you plan and host the tailor-made event of your dream.
Learn More
Start Planning
Custom Event Services
Host an inspiring meeting or a private event in versatile venues with exceptional services, from custom catering to modern décor, audiovisual, group accommodations, and event planning.
Learn More
Start Planning
Event Catering
Incredible cuisine and casually elegant culinary experiences are at the heart of events at Hotel ELEO at the University of Florida. The chefs at Covey Kitchen + Cocktails will craft a custom menu of globally influenced Southern cuisine and cocktails made from the freshest ingredients of Northern Florida.
Learn More
Start Planning
Event Planning in Gainesville
Whether you plan for a corporate meeting or private event like a bridal shower, rehearsal dinner, or a stunning lakeside reception, our sales staff will help you create extraordinary moments in the heart of Gainesville, Fl.
Start Planning
Amenities
1,100 sq. ft. of Meeting & Event Space
U-Shape, Classroom, Banquet Configurations
Complimentary High-speed Wi-Fi
Indoor & Outdoor Space
Catered Meals
Complimentary Valet Parking
Frequently Asked Questions
Can We Reserve Room Blocks for Our Meeting and Event Guests?
Yes. Hotel ELEO offers beautifully designed rooms and suites with city and lake views for your event guests. Whether you host your event at one of the nearby venues in Gainesville, you can reserve a block of rooms with special rates for your event. For event planning and group accommodations, request a proposal.
How Do You Find an Event Venue in Gainesville?
Finding the perfect event venue comes down to personal style and vision. Whether looking for an
elegant indoor/ outdoor venue
or a lakeside patio. We recommend choosing a venue that matches your vision, guest list size, and budget. Consider what the space includes, like catering and audiovisual, and its location for traveling guests. The event planners at Hotel ELEO can share their tips and work with you to create your intimate meeting or celebration, from selecting the venue to designing your menu.
What Makes a Good Event Venue?
Your event space sets the tone for your meeting and events, so choosing the right venue for your style and individuality is imperative. Many elements make up a good
event venue
, including:
Availability for the event dates you desire
Size of the venue to match your guest list
Flexibility of the venue for multiple events
Location near airports and accommodations
Style that matches your personality and vision
Transportation and parking
Catering menus and custom culinary experiences
Event packages that include catering, bar, and staffing
Cost that fits your budget
Does Hotel Eleo Offer Catering?
Hotel ELEO offers creative catering and packages for special events, from brunches to dinner banquets to cocktail parties. Chef Andy Niedenthal and Covey Kitchen + Cocktails create modern southern cuisine with global influences and signature cocktails for wedding receptions and celebrations.

Item 1
Collaborate & Celebrate
Covey Kitchen + Cocktails Events
Covey Kitchen + Cocktails is the perfect space to connect, collaborate and celebrate in the beautiful city of Gainesville. Browse the list of upcoming seasonal events and elevate your getaway at Hotel ELEO at the University of Florida
Live Jazz Nights
Enjoy live jazz music hosted at Covey Kitchen + Cocktails while you savor Floridian-inspired cuisine with hand-crafted cocktails.
When
: Sunday and Wednesday
Time
: 6 PM to 8 PM
Weekend Brunch
Weekend brunch awaits at Covey Kitchen + Cocktails in Hotel ELEO, Gainesville!
Join us every Saturday and Sunday from
7 AM to 4 PM
for an
all-day brunch
featuring an
updated menu
of sweet and savory delights. Pair your meal with signature cocktails like
bottomless Mimosas
.
When
: Saturday + Sunday
Time
: 7 AM to 4 PM
